WITH T01 AS ( -- Dữ liệu theo time sheet SELECT A.*, CASE WHEN LeaveCode LIKE '0.25%' THEN (A.ShiftTime*0.75) WHEN LeaveCode LIKE '0.5%' THEN (A.ShiftTime*0.5) WHEN LeaveCode LIKE '0.75%' THEN (A.ShiftTime*0.25) WHEN LeaveCode = '0' THEN A.ShiftTime ELSE 0 END WorkingTime FROM ( SELECT [CodeEmp], [ProfileName], [NgayCong] , [CaLamViec] , CASE WHEN CaLamViec = '3HCA' THEN 9.5 WHEN CaLamViec = '3HCA1' THEN 9.5 WHEN CaLamViec = '310A' THEN 10 WHEN CaLamViec = '310B' THEN 10 WHEN CaLamViec = '310S' THEN 10 WHEN CaLamViec = '312A' THEN 12 WHEN CaLamViec = '312B' THEN 12 WHEN CaLamViec = '312S' THEN 12 WHEN CaLamViec = '31242A' THEN 12 WHEN CaLamViec = '31242B' THEN 12 WHEN CaLamViec IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 8 END ShiftTime , [LeaveCode] FROM [PVG].[dbo].[View_PIDVN_AttendanceDetail] WHERE 1 = 1 -- AND CodeEmp = '3000230' AND FORMAT(NgayCong, 'yyyy-MM') = FORMAT(#{month}, 'yyyy-MM') ) A ), -- Tính vé theo TimeSheet T02 AS ( -- Tính ra Total Time SELECT B.CodeEmp, B.ProfileName, B.NgayCong, B.LeaveCode, B.CaLamViec, B.WorkingTime WorkingTime, round(B.ConfirmHours, 2) OTTime, (B.WorkingTime + ISNULL(round(B.ConfirmHours, 2), 0) ) TotalWorkingTime FROM ( SELECT T01.*, A.ConfirmHours FROM T01 LEFT JOIN ( -- Dữ liệu OT SELECT CodeEmp , [WorkDateRoot] NgayCong , SUM([ConfirmHours]) ConfirmHours FROM [PVG].[dbo].[View_ThongTinOT_PIDVN] WHERE 1 = 1 AND FORMAT(WorkDateRoot, 'yyyy-MM') = FORMAT(#{month} , 'yyyy-MM') -- AND CodeEmp = '3000230' GROUP BY WorkDateRoot, CodeEmp, ProfileName ) A ON T01.CodeEmp = A.CodeEmp AND T01.NgayCong = A.NgayCong ) B ), T03 AS (
SELECT A.*, (A.VeChinhTimeSheet + A.VeChinhOverTime) VeChinh FROM ( SELECT T02.*, CASE -- Các trường hợp nghỉ WHEN T02.WorkingTime = 0 THEN 0 -- Ca 12 tiếng: số giờ làm thực tế > 6 => được 2 vé chính WHEN (T02.WorkingTime = 12 AND T02.WorkingTime > 6) THEN 2 -- Ca 12 tiếng: số giờ làm thực tế < 6 => được 1 vé chính WHEN (T02.WorkingTime = 12 AND T02.WorkingTime <= 6) THEN 1 ELSE 1 END VeChinhTimeSheet, CASE
-- OT ngày nghỉ: tổng thời gian < 10.5 => có 1 vé chính WHEN (T02.CaLamViec IS NULL AND T02.TotalWorkingTime < 10.5) THEN 1 -- OT ngày nghỉ: 10.5 <= TotalWorkingTime < 11.5 => có 1 vé chính WHEN (T02.CaLamViec IS NULL AND T02.TotalWorkingTime >= 10.5 AND T02.TotalWorkingTime < 11.5) THEN 1 -- OT ngày nghỉ: tổng thời gian >= 11.5 => có 2 vé chính WHEN (T02.CaLamViec IS NULL AND T02.TotalWorkingTime >= 11.5) THEN 2
-- OT ngày thường: tổng thời gian >= 11.5 => có 1 vé chính WHEN (T02.CaLamViec IS NOT NULL AND T02.OTTime IS NOT NULL AND T02.TotalWorkingTime >= 11.5) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END VeChinhOverTime, CASE -- OT ngày nghỉ: 10.5 <= TotalWorkingTime < 11.5 => có 1 vé phụ WHEN (T02.CaLamViec IS NULL AND T02.TotalWorkingTime >= 10.5 AND T02.TotalWorkingTime < 11.5) THEN 1
-- OT ngày thường: 10.5 <= TotalWorkingTime < 11.5 => có 1 vé phụ WHEN (T02.CaLamViec IS NOT NULL AND T02.OTTime IS NOT NULL AND T02.TotalWorkingTime >= 10.5 AND T02.TotalWorkingTime < 11.5) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END VePhu
FROM T02 ) A ), T04 AS ( -- Kết quả theo lý thuyết SELECT T03.CodeEmp, T03.ProfileName, SUM(T03.VeChinh) VeChinhTheory, SUM(T03.VePhu) VePhuTheory FROM T03 GROUP BY T03.CodeEmp, T03.ProfileName ),
T05 AS ( -- Tổng hợp theo Actual SELECT A.CodeEmp, SUM(A.VeChinh) VeChinhActual, SUM(A.VePhu) VePhuActual FROM ( SELECT [CodeEmp], CASE WHEN LineCode = 'PEOC1' THEN 0 WHEN LineCode = 'PBS2' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END VeChinh, CASE WHEN LineCode = 'PEOC1' THEN 1 WHEN LineCode = 'PBS2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END VePhu,
CASE WHEN FORMAT(TimeLog,'HH:mm') <= '07:30' THEN CAST(FORMAT(DATEADD(DAY, -1, TimeLog), 'yyyy-MM-dd') as date ) ELSE CAST(FORMAT(TimeLog,'yyyy-MM-dd') as date) END as Date FROM [PVG].[dbo].[PIDVN_MealRecord] WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( FORMAT(TimeLog, 'yyyy-MM') = FORMAT(#{month} , 'yyyy-MM') OR FORMAT(TimeLog, 'yyyy-MM') = FORMAT(DATEADD(month, 1, #{month}) , 'yyyy-MM') ) -- AND CodeEmp = '3000230' ) A WHERE 1 = 1 AND FORMAT(A.[Date], 'yyyy-MM') = FORMAT(#{month} , 'yyyy-MM') GROUP BY A.CodeEmp ), T06 AS ( SELECT T04.*, T05.VeChinhActual, T05.VePhuActual, (T04.VeChinhTheory - T05.VeChinhActual) VeChinhBalance, (T04.VePhuTheory - T05.VePhuActual) VePhuBalance FROM T04 LEFT JOIN T05 ON T04.CodeEmp = T05.CodeEmp ) SELECT * FROM T06;
